        private void setBoardParameters(String difficulty)
        Set the board parameters based on difficulty.

      • createBoards

        public void createBoards(String difficulty,
                         boolean client,
                         Set<Integer> mineIndicesParam)
        Manages the board creation.
        Parameters:
        difficulty - desired difficulty
        client - client mode flag. In this mode the board is copied from the server
        mineIndicesParam - in client mode this contains the indices of the mines
